name: Magic Panic (AdranGames)
description:
The Land of Hopes and Dreams is a very peaceful land.

But one day he comes...

Mago is a monster from the Underworld of Magic and Transfiguration.

There was no end to his constant harassment of the citizens of the Land of Hopes and Dreams, and so Polaris, the goddess of the Land of Hopes and Dreams, decided to intervene.

The three elite angels Proxima, Capella and Achernar have one task... eliminate Mago.
